heading: Ballads.
general-note: Here are entered collections of ballads in various unrelated languages. Works in a single language or group of languages are entered under this heading with language qualifier, e.g.. Ballads, English; Ballads, Germanic.. For works consisting of ballads of an individual ethnic group, additional subject entries are made under the heading. [ethnic group]--Music. and under the heading. Folk music--[place]. or. Music--[place]..
